greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Difference between A244042 and its Möbius transform.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: f[n_] := FromDigits[IntegerDigits[n, 3] /. 2 -> 0, 3]; Table[f@ n - DivisorSum[n, MoebiusMu[n/#] f@ # &], {n, 97}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 17 2018 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 14 2018
